short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enables users to quickly and effortlessly fill in extensive forms on specific government websites with pre-prepared data.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Google Chrome extension which enables users to quickly and effortlessly fill in extensive forms on specific government websites with pre-prepared data. By working with the Document Object Model (DOM), the extension automatically populates the form fields, while data verification and form submission are left to the user. 
Workflow: 
1. The user navigates to the particular website and activates the extension.
2. The extension prompts the user to log in and subsequently provides a list of pre-prepared data for input. 
3. After selecting the desired data to be entered, the user initiates the process, and the extension proceeds to fill in the form according to the specific website's requirements.
